MasterUrlHint: The base URL the panel can be reached under in the format http://localhost:8080
RegistrationEnabledHint:
Self registered users can't do anything until given permissions

Disabling this only prevents direct registration, invitation to a server and the Users page are not affected
DiscordWebhookHint: Discord webhook URL to receive server alerts (online/offline, resource usage, backups, etc.)
DiscordWebhookSystemHint: Discord webhook URL to receive periodic reports of the complete system status
DiscordWebhookNodeHint: Discord webhook URL to receive information about node/nodes status
TestDiscordFailed: Failed to send test message to Discord
LicenseKeyHint: Enter your license key in the format XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX
LicenseInvalidFormat: Invalid license format. Must be XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX
LicenseActivationFailed: Failed to activate license. Please verify that the key is valid
EmailProviderHint: Select the email provider you want to use to send emails from the panel
EmailProviderSelect: Select the email provider you want to use to send emails from the panel
EmailProviderSelectHint: Select an email provider to see configuration options
NoEmailProvidersAvailable: No provider options available. Check the console.
SettingsDescription: Configure general panel options, notifications, and licenses
